text: was a town located in Asakuchi District, Okayama Prefecture, Japan. As of 2003, Funao had an estimated population of 7,393 and a density of 682.01 persons per km². The total area of the town was 10.84 km². On August 1, 2005, Funao, along with the town of Mabi (from Kibi District), was merged into the expanded city of Kurashiki. Category:Dissolved municipalities of Okayama Prefecture
title: Funao, Okayama
